sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_mispers_action_item"> <x_snc_mispers_action_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <address/> <assigned_to display_value="Carla Humble">a6826bf03710200044e0bfc8bcbe5def</assigned_to> <case display_value="MISPERS0001002">6a009c311b745990db301f83b24bcb9a</case> <due_date>2023-07-20 17:55:00</due_date> <id>2751158</id> <notes>Contact/family updates every 25 hours (minimum) or where there is a significant update - Frequency of updates to be agreed at initial point of contact.</notes> <number>ACTION0001030</number> <report_reference>12</report_reference> <start_date>2022-07-20 17:55:00</start_date> <status>Suspended</status> <summary>false</summary> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-06 08:31:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0573cb8d1bf59190db301f83b24bcb0b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 10:59:46</sys_updated_on> <title>Maintain contact with Family/Next of Kin or Agency responsible for Missing Person</title> <type>Family Liaison</type> </x_snc_mispers_action_item> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Maintain contact with Family/Next of Kin or Agency responsible for Missing Person
